section.title: EscapeFunc
section.para:
By default the key sequence Ctrl-Alt-Escape allows for escaping from a
pause and from a locked
command. The EscapeFunc command used with the
command allows for configuring this key sequence. An example:
section.programlisting: Escape A MC - Escape A S EscapeFunc
section.para:
replaces the Ctrl-Alt-Escape key sequence with Shift-Escape for aborting a
pause and
command. EscapeFunc used outside the
command does nothing.
